sen.j: 大智（だいち、正応3年（1290年）- 正平 (日本)21年/貞治5年12月10日 (旧暦)（1367年1月10日））は、鎌倉時代後期から南北朝時代 (日本)にかけての曹洞宗の僧。
sen.e: Daichi (1290 - January 10, 1367) was a monk of the Soto sect of Zen Buddhism who lived from the late Kamakura period to the period of the Northern and Southern Courts.
Daichi (1290 - January 18, 1367) was a Buddhist priest of the Sotoshu sect from the late Kamakura period to the period of the Northern and Southern Courts.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦に直し用語を変更しました。
sen.e: Daichi (1290 - January 18, 1367) was a Buddhist priest of the Sotoshu sect from the late Kamakura period to the period of the Northern and Southern Courts.
He was from Higo Province.

sen.j: 7歳の時大慈寺の寒巌義尹に師事した。
sen.e: Daichi began to study under Giin KANGEN in Daiji-ji Temple when he was seven years old.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処寒巌義尹：読み方不明、Giin KANGEN としました。
sen.e: Daichi began to study under Giin KANGEN in Daiji-ji Temple at the age of seven.
Daichi began to study under Giin KANGEN in Daiji-ji Temple at the age of seven.

sen.j: 義尹の没後は鎌倉建長寺・京都法観寺・加賀国大乗寺などを訪れている。
sen.e: After Giin died, Daichi visited Kencho-ji Temple in Kamakura, Hokan-ji Temple in Kyoto, Daijo-ji Temple in Kaga Province amongst others.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: After Giin died, Daichi visited Kencho-ji Temple in Kamakura, Hokan-ji Temple in Kyoto, and Daijo-ji Temple in Kaga Province, and so on.
After Giin died, Daichi visited Kencho-ji Temple in Kamakura, Hokan-ji Temple in Kyoto, and Daijo-ji Temple in Kaga Province, and so on.

sen.j: 1314年（正和3年）中国（元 (王朝)）に渡り、古林清茂（くりんせいも）、雲外雲岫（うんがいうんしゅう）らに学ぶ。
sen.e: In 1314 Daichi went to China (Yuan Dynasty) and studied under Seimo KURIN and Unshu UNGAI amongst others.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処

sen.j: 1324年（正中 (日本)元年）日本に帰国した後は、瑩山紹瑾（けいざんじょうきん）の指示により明峰素哲のもとで参禅した。
sen.e: After returning to Japan in 1324, Daichi practiced Zen meditation under Sotetsu MEIHO on the orders of Jokin KEIZAN.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処

sen.j: その後加賀国に祇陀寺を開創し、さらに肥後国に聖護寺を開創。
sen.e: After that Daichi founded Kida-ji Temple in Kaga Province and also Shogo-ji Temple in Higo Province.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処

sen.j: また肥後菊地氏の帰依を受けて広福寺を創建し、菊地氏一族に大きな精神的影響を与えた。
sen.e: Also Daichi founded Kofuku-ji Temple as a result of the Kikuchi family's embracing religion and he had an enormous spiritual influence on the Kikuchi family.

sen.e: Also Daichi founded Kofuku-ji Temple as a result of the Higo-Kikuchi clan's embracing religion and he had an enormous spiritual influence on the Kikuchi clan.

sen.j: 1353年（正平8年/文和2年）には有馬澄世の招きにより肥前国加津佐（現長崎県南島原市加津佐町）に赴き、水月山円通寺を創建。
sen.e: In 1353 Daichi went to Kazusa, Hizen Province (present day Kazusa Town, Minamishimabara City, Nagasaki Prefecture) accepting the invitation from Sumiyo ARIMA and founded Entsu-ji Temple on Mt. Suigetsu.
